description: DAO document model containing core DAO metadata, treasury, and organization info
name: DAO

operations.name: CREATE_DAO
UPDATE_DAO_METADATA
operations.reducer:
if (action.input.name !== undefined) state.name = action.input.name;
if (action.input.description !== undefined) state.description = action.input.description || null;

global.schema:
type DAO {
  id: OID!
  name: String!
  description: String
  createdAt: DateTime!
  treasury: Amount_Money
}

type DaoState {
  id: OID
  name: String
  description: String
  createdAt: DateTime
  treasury: Amount_Money
}
